data.message:
Dear slim,,,your a famous rapper,,,and I know,growing up,your life was even crapper,but man your rhymes are even faster,if you taught me a few things I could become a master just like you. Please answer me back and tell me the truth.Your Eminem and,,, I see a glimpse of the future,you've inspire us all,even when we fall we get back up on top,I wish you could listen to this little o' song

Xoxoxxxxoxoxoxxoxoxoxox
